filters

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.Filter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BandPassFilter, FFTFilter, ShortTimeFourierFilter, SpectralDensityFilter, WelchMethodFilter

    public abstract class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract layer for the filters
    Author:
    knoodrake
